ygData.subject: using cantera in a parallel code

Hello

I would like to use cantera in a C++ parallel code for combustion 
computation.
Do I have to use independent instances of the class IdealGasMix for each 
element of my parallel loops or is there another way to do it ?


Thanks

Violaine Louvet.
